dr.inference.markovjumps
Class StateHistory

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.markovjumps.StateHistory
Direct Known Subclasses:
UniformizedStateHistory
public class StateHistory
extends java.lang.Object

A class to represent the complete state history of a continuous-time Markov chain in the interval [0,T].

This work is supported by NSF grant 0856099

Author:
Marc A. Suchard
